title: Follower count distribution on Twitter 2014
summary: This statistic shows a ranking of the five Twitter Number in the Twitter ( ) , 2014 the Percentage to Twitter users .
Results are for the full financial year of 2014 .
1-100 was 2014 highest in 2014 , with the Percentage to Twitter users equaling 93.68 percentage .
gold: This statistic gives information on the follower count distribution on Twitter . As of April 2014 , 93.68 percent of Twitter users had between 1 and 100 followers on the microblogging site .
